intro: Impatiens schliehenii, commonly known as the Schliehenii Impatiens, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the genus Impatiens, which is part of the family Balsaminaceae. The plant is characterized by its showy, spurred flowers that come in a variety of colors, typically pink or white. Its leaves are ovate and often have a slightly hairy texture. Impatiens schliehenii is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks.
